Hi,

I created a castle windsor extension, which allows you to replace Unity with Windsor.

A Composite WPF / Prism Windsor Extension contains:

  • WindsorBootstrapper
  • ServiceLocationAdapter for Microsoft.Practices.ServiceLocation

Contained in Lib:

  • CompositeWPF / Prism v4 drop 10 
  • Castle.Core 1.1.0.0
  • Castle.DynamicProxy 2.1.0.0
  • Castle.MicroKernel 2.0.0.5642
  • Castle.Windsor 2.0.0.5642
  • log4net 1.2.10.0

You can find it at http://github.com/bszafko/PrismContrib.WindsorExtensions

This sounds like a useful addition.  You may want to see if the folks at the Composite WPF Contrib project ( http://compositewpfcontrib.codeplex.com/ ) want to incorporate it into the community extensions for Prism.

Unfortunately the contrib project seems to be dead.

I wrote at their forum but no answer.

So for now it stays on github.
For future reference there is also now a nuget package called prism.windsorextensions http://nuget.org/Packages/Packages/Details/Prism-WindsorExtensions-4-0-0-0
